identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a modern, minimal, yet emotionally resonant SaaS thumbnail generator.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with Creator Economy vibrancy.
Emotion First: The tool should feel 'powerful' yet 'effortless'.
Content is King: The user's thumbnail is the hero; the UI is the stage.
Negative Space: Extreme breathing room to prevent 'tool fatigue'.
Contrast: Sharp black lines against soft backgrounds.

theme_strategy.reasoning: Light mode provides the best neutral canvas for color-critical work (thumbnail design). It evokes clarity and precision.

headings.usage: Use for all major section headers and feature titles. Adds a 'tech-editorial' feel.

body.usage: Use for UI labels, instructions, and long-form text. Highly legible at small sizes.

mono.usage: Use for values, coordinates, and technical data.

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts or Fontshare in index.css

background.name: Canvas White
background.usage: Main app background. Avoid pure #FFFFFF to reduce eye strain.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 hover:scale-105 transition-transform duration-200 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-gray-200 text-primary rounded-full px-8 py-3 hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors
buttons.ghost: text-gray-500 hover:text-primary hover:bg-gray-100 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.style: bg-white border border-gray-100 rounded-2xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-300

inputs.style: bg-gray-50 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:bg-white rounded-lg px-4 py-3 transition-all duration-200 outline-none

textures.noise: Use a subtle SVG noise overlay at 2% opacity on the background to prevent digital flatness.

motion.micro_interactions: Buttons scale up 1.02x on hover. Inputs glow on focus.

hero_background.description: Soft orange abstract shapes on a light background. Use as a subtle backdrop for the hero section.

feature_workspace.description: Minimalist workspace with pencils. Represents the 'Creation' aspect.

thumbnail_examples.description: Vibrant geometric pattern. Use as a sample generated thumbnail.
Concentric squares rainbow. Use as a sample generated thumbnail.

libraries.3d: None required for this MVP. Focus on 2D Canvas API for thumbnail generation.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
